yuropol warthawata anuwa wideshayanhi el.ti.ti.ee. peramunu sanwidhana wisin nonawathwa, aramudal raskirime katayuthu sidukaragena yanu labana bawin me sambandhayen wimasillen ha akhanda sodisiyen pasuwima athyawashya baw widesha katayuthu amathi mahacharya ji. el. piris mahatha dakunu aasiyanu ratawal ha sabandi yuropiya parlimenthu niyojitha kandayamata danwa sitiyeya.dakunu aasiyanu ratawal ha sabandi yuropa parlimenthu niyojitha kandayama samanga pasugiya brahaspathinda widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye pawathi dwiparshwika sakachchawedi amathi piris mahatha mema illima karanu labiya.thrasthawadin ha owunge thaththwayan ha prawanatha pilibanda yuropa sangamaya sandaha wana yuropol warthawata anuwa meki el. ti. ti. ee. peramunu sanwidhana thawaduratath kriyakari bawath owun wisheshayen el. ti. ti. ee. hithathi drawida prajawan wadi washayen wesena ratawalwalin wasi ha prathilabha labamin pasuwana bawath amathyawaraya pawasiya.

rajathumage pradhana amathi washayen kriya kala pilima kalawe wijaya sundara rajakaruna hathara korale disaralahami wisin karawa kri.wa. 1776 di edawasa asgiri mahapadawiya daru urulawaththe shri pi්rayadarshi dhamma siddhi syamopali mahanikaye prathama mahanayaka swamindrayan wahanse pradhana maha sangharathnayata rajathumanange pradhanathwayen puja karana ladi.pramanayen kuda wuwada aakruthiya ha wiharanga menma chithra ha murthikala nirmanayen  sampurna mema wiharaya darshana mathrayen mehi rajakiyathwaya ha udarathwaya prakata kere.
